attributes.additional_details: It's so messed up if they do. It's not the 1950s
attributes.background: To not take away the rights of women and LGBTQ+, to not make abortion illegal and to not take away the Human Rights Act

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607712

If there are specific Government proposals you want to see changed or reversed, we could accept a petition about that.
